'''Daniel Larson''' is the husband of [[Amy Larson]] and [[Laura Larson]].

==History==
Daniel came into the practice with his wife, Laura, who was pregnant. An ultrasound showed signs of DiGeorge Syndrome, a serious condition. Panicked, Daniel brought in his other wife, Amy, who was also pregnant, worried that her regular OB might have missed something. Addison was shocked that Daniel had two wives and said that she would do the ultrasound, but for Amy, not for him.

Knowing that she couldn't directly tell either woman about the other, Addison called them both into the practice and left them in a room together. They quickly figured out they were married to the same man and argued. Daniel was furious that Addison had told them and both women declared that they were leaving him.

Amy later went into labor. She said she didn't want to give birth alone, but she also didn't want Daniel there. Laura held her hand while she gave birth. Daniel came in shortly after and wanted to mend fences, but they asked him to leave.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
====[[Laura Larson]]====
He is married to Laura Larson. He'd met her three years prior while already married to Amy. When he's away, he sends roses for her and daisies for their baby, Daisy.

====[[Amy Larson]]====
He's been married to Amy for 12 years. He says he's been with Amy since he was 21.

===Familial===
He has two children with Amy, a son and a newborn. He's also expecting a daughter with Laura, whom they had named Daisy.
